tasks.label: Test App
tasks.detail: Runs the app via npm run dev (starts Vite + Electron). Stop the task to clean up processes.

tasks.label: Create EXE
tasks.detail: Builds a portable EXE named 'PPAS Proposal Builder v__' in the 'portable builds' folder

tasks.label: Release Patch x.x.0
tasks.command: npm version patch; git push; git push --tags
tasks.detail: Increments patch version (1.0.9 → 1.0.10) and pushes tag to GitHub. GitHub Actions will automatically build Windows NSIS installer and Mac DMG, then publish to Releases.

tasks.label: Release Minor x.0.x
tasks.command: npm version minor; git push; git push --tags
tasks.detail: Increments minor version (1.0.9 → 1.1.0) and pushes tag to GitHub. GitHub Actions will automatically build Windows NSIS installer and Mac DMG, then publish to Releases.

tasks.label: Release Major 0.x.x
tasks.command: npm version major; git push; git push --tags
tasks.detail: Increments major version (1.0.9 → 2.0.0) and pushes tag to GitHub. GitHub Actions will automatically build Windows NSIS installer and Mac DMG, then publish to Releases.
